file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content: openapi: 3.0.0 servers: - description: Production url: 'https://workbcjobs.api.gov.bc.ca/v1' info: description: 'This API allows you to receive a feed of jobs from WorkBC''s Job Board. Please see our data collection notice. Please note that you may experience issues when submitting requests to the delivery or test environment if using this [OpenAPI specification](https://github.com/bcgov/api-specs) in other API console viewers.' title: WorkBC Job Posting version: 1.0.0 x-apisguru-categories: - open_data x-logo: url: 'https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/916280?v=3&s=200' x-origin: - converter: url: 'https://github.com/lucybot/api-spec-converter' version: 2.7.18 format: openapi url: 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bcgov/api-specs/master/jobposting/jobposting.json' version: '3.0' x-providerName: gov.bc.ca x-serviceName: jobposting paths: /Industries: get: description: | The Industries endpoint returns all the Industries and related sub industries defined in WorkBC's Job Board. The response includes the id and caption for each industry and each sub industry. responses: '200': content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Industry' type: array description: An array of industries and sub industries default: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: Unexpected error summary: Industries tags: - Job Feed /jobTypes: get: description: | The Job Types endpoint returns details of all of the job types defined in WorkBC's Job Board. The response includes the id and caption. responses: '200': content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/JobType' type: array description: An array of job types default: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: Unexpected error summary: Job Types tags: - Job Feed /jobs: post: description: The job feed endpoint returns an array of job records that satisfy the supplied criteria. requestBody: content: application/json: encoding: color: explode: true style: form schema: properties: city: default: Victoria description: 'The name of a city within B.C. Only job postings located within the specified city will be included in the response. If not specified, the data is not filtered by city.' enum: - Victoria - Vancouver type: string jobTypes: default: - 1 description: 'ID values for types of job to filter on. Only job postings matching all specified values will be included in the response. If not specified, the data is not filtered by job type.' enum: - - 1 - - 2 type: integer lastRequestDate: default: '2018-08-29' description: The date of the last request. Only job postings changed or deleted after this time will be included in the response. Default is _today_ - 10 days. enum: - '2018-08-29T00:00:00.000Z' type: string majorProjects: default: true description: 'When true, only include job postings that have a Major Project associated with them. When false, only include job postings that do not have a Major Project associated with them. If not specified, the data is not filtered by major project, unless the MajorProjectID parameter is used.' type: boolean region: default: 1 description: 'The unique id of a region within B.C. Only job postings located within the specified region will be included in the response. If not specified, the data is not filtered by region' enum: - 1 - 2 type: integer type: object responses: '200': content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/JobFeedResponse' description: A set of job records. default: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: Unexpected error summary: Job Feed tags: - Job Feed /majorProjects: get: description: | The Major Projects endpoint returns details of all of the major projects defined in WorkBC's Job Board. The response includes the id and caption. responses: '200': content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/MajorProject' type: array description: An array of major projects default: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: Unexpected error summary: Major Projects tags: - Job Feed /regions: get: description: | The Regions endpoint returns details of all of the regions defined in WorkBC's Job Board. The response includes the id and caption. responses: '200': content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Region' type: array description: An array of regions default: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error' description: Unexpected error summary: Regions tags: - Job Feed components: schemas: Error: properties: Message: type: string type: object Industry: properties: Caption: description: The name of the Industries. type: string ID: description: Industry ID. type: integer SubIndustries: items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/SubIndustry' type: array type: object Job: properties: EmployerName: description: The name of the employer who is offering the job. type: string ExpiryDate: description: The date that the job will expire. It is the caller's responsibility to remove job postings once they expire. After this date the supplied Url will show a 404 page. format: date-time type: string JobDescription: description: 'Details of the job posting. This is limited to 250 characters, and HTML tags are stripped out. For a full description, use the Url property to view the job posting on the WorkBC website.' type: string JobID: description: The unique id of the job in the WorkBC Job Board database. type: integer JobTitle: description: The name of the job posting. type: string JobTypes: description: The types of work associated with this job. items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/JobType' type: array Locations: description: Details of all of the locations where the job is available. items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Location' type: array MajorProject: $ref: '#/components/schemas/MajorProject' PostedDate: description: The date that the job was posted. format: date-time type: string RecordType: $ref: '#/components/schemas/RecordType' SalaryMax: format: double type: number SalaryMin: format: double type: number SalaryMultiplier: description: The amount to multiply SalaryMin and SalaryMax by in order to convert to annual values. This is needed if you want to compare salaries for jobs that have been posted using different salary types. type: integer SalaryType: type: string Url: description: The URL for the live job posting on the WorkBC website. type: string type: object JobFeedResponse: properties: Jobs: items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Job' type: array type: object JobType: properties: Caption: description: The name of the Job Type. type: string ID: $ref: '#/components/schemas/JobTypeID' type: object JobTypeID: description: The type of work. enum: - Undefined0 - Full-Time - Part-Time - Contract - Undefined4 - Undefined5 - Student - Undefined7 - Undefined8 - Casual - Seasonal - Temporary - Permanent - Co-op - Apprenticeship type: integer Location: description: Details of where a job is located. A job can have up to three associated locations. properties: City: description: The name of the city where the job is located. type: string Province: description: The name of the province where the job is located. type: string RegionID: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Region' RegionName: description: The name of the region in B.C. where the job is located. type: string type: object MajorProject: properties: Caption: description: The name of the Major Project. type: string ID: description: The unique ID of the Major Project in the WorkBC Job Board database. Use this when restricting the Job Feed to only one Major Project. type: integer type: object RecordType: description: The type of change that has happened to this job. enum: - Undefined - Update - Delete type: integer Region: properties: Caption: description: The name of the Region. type: string ID: $ref: '#/components/schemas/RegionID' type: object RegionID: description: A region within B.C. enum: - Undefined - Vancouver Island/Coast - Mainland/Southwest - Thompson-Okanagan - Kootenay - Cariboo - North Coast - Nechako - Northeast type: integer SubIndustry: properties: Caption: description: The name of the SubIndustries. type: string ID: description: Sub Industry ID. type: integer type: object

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: at 1:15: schemas: "Job": parse schema: property "JobTypes": at 1:1128: parse schema: item: at 1:1197: parse schema: resolve "#/components/schemas/JobType": parse schema: property "ID": at 1:2335: parse schema: resolve "#/components/schemas/JobTypeID": parse enum values: parse value "\"Undefined0\"": expected type "integer", got "string"
